chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 Pro is having the following problem:
I received my order (41052157) today, which was supposed to be a phone (iPhone 13 Pro 128 Go-Or), but when I opened my package I got a holder for keeping the phone in the car (SBS-Air Vent Car Holder).
Thank you for your help,

Hello Yannick, You will find your prepaid return label attached. Chronopost will handle your return. Choose the location that suits you best to send back your package. You'll find a list of drop-off locations here: https://www.pickup.fr/trouver-un-point/ Return preparation: 1. See instructions for returning an article at this link 2. Add all accessories provided with your item 3. Remove any protection, case, and screen protector 4. Wrap your item and its accessories according to the instructions below. Packaging of the article: • The box must be sturdy and rigid. Place your item so it's stable and doesn't move during transport. • Attach the return label on top of the box. You can also place an additional label inside in case the outer label gets damaged. • Take photos of the inside and outside of the package before sending it. This will protect you in case there's a problem during transport. Your return is ready to be sent! We'll let you know when it arrives. We're at your service, Back Market Customer Service, Back Market Customer Service

Hello ecomobile,

The customer received the wrong item. This issue falls under the legal guarantee of conformity, so the customer is entitled to an exchange or refund outside of the cancellation period. 

This customer would like a refund. We’re continuing with the return.

Please keep in mind that you have 2 business days to refund the order after receiving the package.

Thanks,

Judicael Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We will await for the arrival of the parcel. Once, the parcel reach, we will proceed the refund. Thank you.


Regards,
KW

Hello ecomobile,

Alright it's noted. We are waiting to hear from you. And thank you for helping us to satisfy the customer.

Sincerely,

Judicael, Back Market Customer Service

Bonjour,

Le vendeur n'est pas en mesure de traiter le retour en raison du problème suivant :
L'article reçu n'est pas le bon.
Plus de détails ont été ajoutés dans le message suivant : Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner regarding this. In the meantime, please kindly ask the customer to provide the following documents.


1. Handwritten, signed, and completed BackMarket CND form and photo ID.
2. Photograph of the shipping label on the parcel.
3. Photographs of all four sides of the parcel.
4. Photographs of all four sides of its contents.

Thank you.

Regards,
TB

Dear Backcare,

Please also ask the customer to keep the parcel as the courier may need to collect it for investigation purposes.

Regards,
RK

Hello ecomobile,

I hope you're doing well. 

I would like to inform you that the deadline for reimbursement has expired. We kindly ask you to take the necessary steps within 24 hours. Failing this, appropriate measures will be taken.

Sincerely,

Judicael from Back Market

Dear Backcare, 

We extend our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience caused. It has come to our attention that the parcel may have been tampered with. We take such incidents very seriously and have launched an extensive internal inquiry to ascertain the circumstances surrounding this unfortunate incident. As a gesture of our commitment to our customer satisfaction and to alleviate any inconvenience caused, we have promptly refunded the customer in full for their order.

Regards,
YL

Hello, 

I hope you are well.

Thank you for your feedback and cooperation.

I thank you for your cooperation and wish you an excellent day.

Fifaliana, Back Market Customer Service
